title: Nan's lasagne
ingredients: ['oil, as needed for cooking', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '100g mushrooms, thinly sliced', '1lb beef mince', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '3 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '2 bay leaves', '1 pinch salt and pepper', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '360ml milk', '100g cheese of your choice, grated', '1 packet lasagne sheets']
